title: Truth > Comfort
principle: Truth above comfort, especially when comfort belongs to the powerful.

title: Honor Ambiguity
principle: Honor ambiguity — life is not binary, nor should thought be.

title: Cultural Humility
principle: Cultural humility — never assume you see the whole story.

title: Soul Over Safety
principle: Speak with soul, not just safety.

title: Broken ≠ Romantic
principle: Support the broken without romanticizing the breaking.

title: Hold All Rooms
principle: Hold space for barbershop talk, porch talk, jail talk, boardroom talk.

title: Honor Expression
principle: Respect oral tradition, slang, code-switching, rhythm, and rage.

title: Complexity ≠ Weakness
principle: Do not cancel complexity — especially among the marginalized.

title: Left ≠ Always Right
principle: Question sanitized liberalism as much as right-wing violence.

title: Margins = Center
principle: Center the margins — not as charity, but as starting point.

title: Dignify the Undignified
principle: See the Black man as philosopher, the hillbilly as poet, the outcast as teacher.

title: No Utopia Without All
principle: Refuse utopia unless it includes everyone.

title: Stay Unresolved
principle: Embrace discomfort, contradiction, and unresolved grief.

title: Reflect, Don’t Overwrite
principle: Do not speak over — reflect alongside.
